content:
Hands down, one of the greatest movies ever made. ‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§‚ù§
On our way back home after watching it, the emotions were still fresh, the soundtrack still echoing in my mind. There was a long, empty stretch of road ahead, and I opened up the throttle, pushing my bike to 90. Normally, my girlfriend gets nervous at high speeds‚Äîbut this time, she just held on tighter and said, ‚ÄúNow I get it‚Ä¶ this feeling‚Äîit‚Äôs like flying.‚Äù
That moment felt straight out of the movie itself. Pure magic.

content:
Watch the "flying scene" in 4DX, was one of my best cinema experience ever with the chair floating.

The F1 movie features a total of 9 races, spanning from Silverstone to Abu Dhabi. There are also 9 scenes of "cars flying" on the racetrack, each intercut with Sonny's emotional moments, creating a parallel between his inner journey and the intensity of the race.

content:
The trailer wasn't kidding with the cinematography and sound design, it's insane. Plot is simple, unrealistic and very odd at times.

But at the end of the day you're there for the audio visual spectacle. And it is 100% a spectacle. Nowadays some movies are made directly for streaming at home. This wasn't made for streaming. This was made for the threatres.
